name: Lost Man (Tulsa Vanguard)
description:
Title: Lost Man

Platform: PC Game

Genre: Patformer

Rating: E

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers

Game Overview:

Welcome to sector [ERROR]!!!! Apologies, it seems that we have lost your coordinates, but don't fret! We can help each other out as long as you gather the gems on the neighboring planet! Gather approximately 34839125794812759871249857 and we will help you find your way home. So best to get running, enjoy your stay dear astronaut!

Instructions:

Controls:

-Space key to Jump

-Left click to select

Objective:

-Keep running and gather the star gems for as long as you can!

Designed by Coleby Craig
